anglr
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Examples with anglr
    • Spatial data and topology
  • News

Raster anglr

Colours not supported, this just gives the viridis palette sequentially.

Create primitive-based "mesh" structures from various inputs.

# S3 method for BasicRaster
anglr(x, z = NULL, ..., na.rm = TRUE, type = NULL,
  max_area = NULL)

# S3 method for trip
anglr(x, z = NULL, ..., type = NULL, max_area = NULL)

anglr(x, ...)

# S3 method for default
anglr(x, z = NULL, ..., type = NULL, max_area = NULL)

# S3 method for SpatialMultiPoints
anglr(x, z = NULL, ..., type = NULL,
  max_area = NULL)

# S3 method for SpatialPoints
anglr(x, z = NULL, ..., type = NULL,
  max_area = NULL)

# S3 method for mesh3d
anglr(x, z = NULL, ..., type = NULL, max_area = NULL)

Arguments

x

input data
z

raster, by default x is used
...

arguments passed to methods
na.rm

remove missing values
type

type of topology to create (LINE or POLYGON)
max_area

maximum area in coordinate system of x, passed to triangulate 'a' argument

Value

quad_mesh

a list of tibble data frames, using the gris-map_table model

Details

#' Methods exist for SpatialPolygons, SpatialLines, rgl mesh3d(triangle) ...

Warning

anglr only checks for presence of triangle centres within known holes, so this doesn't pick up examples of overlapping areas e.g. https://github.com/hypertidy/anglr/issues/39

Examples

library(raster)
#> Loading required package: sp
w <- raster(volcano)
plot(anglr(w/300))
#> Warning: 'anglr(<raster>)' is deprecated.
#> Use 'QUAD' instead.
#> See help("Deprecated") and help("anglr-deprecated").
#> Warning: 'plot(<quad_mesh>)' is deprecated.
#> Use 'plot.QUAD' instead.
#> See help("Deprecated") and help("anglr-deprecated").

## -----------------------------------------------
## POLYGONS
data(simpleworld)
b <- anglr(simpleworld)
#> Warning: 'anglr(<line-topology>)' is deprecated.
#> Use 'silicate::SC or silicate::TRI, and plot3d.SC' instead.
#> See help("Deprecated") and help("anglr-deprecated").
#> Warning: 'anglr(x)' is deprecated.
#> Use 'use silicate::SC(x) or silicate::TRI(x)' instead.
#> See help("Deprecated") and help("anglr-deprecated").
plot(b)
#> Warning: 'plot(<tri_mesh>)' is deprecated.
#> Use 'plot.TRI' instead.
#> See help("Deprecated") and help("anglr-deprecated").

## -----------------------------------------------
## RGL TRIANGLES
library(rgl)
#> 
#> Attaching package: ‘rgl’
#> The following object is masked from ‘package:anglr’:
#> 
#>     triangulate

dod <- anglr(dodecahedron3d(col = "cyan"))
octo <- anglr(translate3d(octahedron3d(col = "blue"), 6, 0, 0))
plot(dod, col = viridis::viridis(5)[1], alpha = 0.3)
#> Warning: 'plot(<tri_mesh>)' is deprecated.
#> Use 'plot.TRI' instead.
#> See help("Deprecated") and help("anglr-deprecated").
plot(octo, col = viridis::viridis(5)[5], alpha = 0.3)
#> Warning: 'plot(<tri_mesh>)' is deprecated.
#> Use 'plot.TRI' instead.
#> See help("Deprecated") and help("anglr-deprecated").
bg3d("grey")
